name: Home Health Agency Hotline
description: The Home Health Agency Hotline is a state-operated service that provides information and assistance related to home health agencies in Kentucky. This hotline helps individuals and families find and access home health care services, provides information about licensed home health agencies, and assists with questions about home health care options and eligibility. The service is operated by the Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
source: Verified from multiple official sources including Kentucky.gov resource guides, KY-SPIN, and various community resource directories
notes: State-operated hotline for home health agency information and assistance. Part of the Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services. Serves all counties in Kentucky. Provides information about licensed home health agencies and home health care services.
